messages.msgSnippet: Is this the right group? Hi ALL I m new here. I ll listen for a day or two before I jump all over you all! Bridget ~~~~If electricity comes from
messages.messageBody:
Is this the right group?

Hi ALL

I'm new here.

I'll listen for a day or two before I jump all over you all!

Bridget

~~~~If electricity comes from electrons...does that mean that morality
comes from morons?~~~~
I sent my Soul through the Invisible,
Some letter of that After-life to spell;
And by and by my Soul returned to me,
And answered, "I Myself am Heaven and Hell." -- The Rubaiyat
